reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The WREANU Bluetooth mouse is a cutting-edge accessory that has been designed to make the lives of professionals and casual users easier. This device has been carefully crafted with precision and attention to detail, and it embodies a perfect blend of functionality and style. In this essay, we will take a closer look at the WREANU Bluetooth mouse and provide an in-depth review of its features and performance.First and foremost, the WREANU Bluetooth mouse stands out with its sleek, modern design. The mouse has a slim, symmetrical shape that fits comfortably in the hand, making it suitable for both right and left-handed users. The matte finish gives it a sophisticated and premium look, while the smooth, silent-click buttons provide a satisfying tactile response. In addition, the mouse is available in a range of vibrant color options, allowing users to choose a design that matches their personal style and preferences.One of the standout features of the WREANU Bluetooth mouse is its wireless connectivity. With Bluetooth 5.0 technology, the mouse can connect effortlessly to any compatible device without the need for a dongle or receiver. This makes it a convenient and hassle-free option for users who want to declutter their workspace and eliminate the need for tangled wires. Furthermore, the mouse has a long-lasting battery life, allowing users to enjoy uninterrupted usage without the need for frequent recharging.In terms of performance, the WREANU Bluetooth mouse delivers exceptional precision and accuracy. Equipped with a high-resolution optical sensor, the mouse glides smoothly across various surfaces, providing responsive and reliable tracking. Whether users are navigating through documents, editing photos, or playing games, the mouse ensures smooth and consistent performance, allowing for precise cursor control and fluid movement.Another noteworthy aspect of the WREANU Bluetooth mouse is its customizable features. The mouse comes with programmable buttons that allow users to assign shortcuts and commands for quick access to frequently used functions. This adds a layer of personalization and efficiency, enabling users to streamline their workflow and boost productivity. Additionally, the mouse is compatible with both Windows and Mac operating systems, ensuring seamless integration with a wide range of devices.The WREANU Bluetooth mouse is a standout peripheral that offers a winning combination of style, functionality, and performance. With its sleek design, wireless connectivity, precision tracking, and customizable features, this mouse is a versatile and reliable tool for professionals and casual users alike. Whether it's for work, studying, or leisure, the WREANU Bluetooth mouse is a valuable addition to any tech-savvy individual's arsenal, and it is undoubtedly a top contender in the realm of wireless mice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flawless so far hope it last
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for at least 3 weeks now, and it's been working very well. I bought it for my android tablet Samsung Galaxy s7+, although I have a keyboard case with the mouse pad, but I don't like using that touchpad mousepad built in with the keyboard, I like the traditional mouse to hold like this one. Especially if you're playing games, but most of the time I'm doing browsing and a lot of clicking, One charge and I've been using for at 3 weeks, no re-charge yet. Very comfortable since it's small and light to hold. I have not have any issue with connectivity either and my android tablet was able to pair with multiple devices including this mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: The little mouse works good. We'll for the price it's more than enough. Wouldn't really recommend it for someone who plays games or need something really precise. But for regular everyday use like checking emails, browsing the web, editing videos/pics it more than enough.Pros:-Can be used with Bluetooth or wifi.-Long battery run time per charge. Plus it's rechargeable.-Works on a white desk where my standard wired mouse didn't and needed a pad.-The RGB lights are cool-The mouse sensitivity and speed can you quickly adjusted by the little buttonCons:-I notice a slight delay. Not sure if it's because of the mouse, bluetooth settings, or simply my laptop. Not really a big issue, but that's why I don't recommend it for gaming.-The silent clickers is nice, but the tactical feel is not the same for the left and right clicks. The left is too soft compared to the right click. This is probably due to low quality control.-The scroll wheel doesn't feel nice like a standard mouse. Mines feel cheap when scrolling and pushing down on the wheel.-Its's a compact mouse, but has a very plastic feel.I would buy again as a back up mouse. Since this wireless mouse works good enough for what I need. Might even buy a couple and leave them at my work, home, and laptop bag when traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I've had this mouse for about a year now.This little mouse has been excellent for me! I put a magnetic charger on the front to make it easier to charge with current technology.It comes with bluetooth capabilities, so connects to my Samsung Galaxy tab S7FE pretty easily with good stability of connection, I rarely have an issue with it not clicking, and even then, most of the time its because it turns itself off when not in use.It comes with a USB dongle, so I am able to connect it to my laptop without unpairing it from my tablet! A simple slider switch on the bottom changes it from bluetooth, to off, to USB dongle in an instant.The slider switch on the bottom drags just a bit on smooth surfaces, so I recommend a mouse pad, and the mouse is just a little small compared to a standard sized mouse, takes some time to get used to. overall, I cant complain at all! Its tackled any challenge I throw at it, and has withstood the test of time for over a year, its been around the world with me and back, and has never given me any issues.10/10 would recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Great Buy - not so much. DO NOT PURCHASE
reviews.reviewText: Originally - like a couple of hours after my mouse arrived and was in use, I wrote the following review:THe only thing I don't like about this purchase is the charging cable. It is a pathetic scrap of cable. Because my USB ports are all behind my PC tower - which is tucked away in a ventilated cabinet under my desk, BTW - I had to go out and buy an extension cable, just to be able to charge my mouse from a power board (secured to the underside of my desk) and have the mouse on the desk, and not hanging in mid-air. Cannot fathom why the manufacturer thought a 17cm cable would be sufficient. It's not as if a longer cable would have broken the bank...NOW, though - on New Year's Eve and after persevering with the device, I have changed my opinion. I am not liking this mouse. It has to be recharged every single night, and does not make it through an 8 hour day without being connected by an extension lead (attached to it's pitiful lead) to my PC for power. It also goes to sleep very quickly, and then you have to click the wretched thing to get it to wake up. The problem with that is that if your cursor was somewhere undesirable when the mouse went to sleep, you're living dangerously when you have to click to wake the thing up! I've deleted stuff, closed webinars without warning and generally lost stuff because this stupid mouse likes to go to sleep at the drop of a hat.It will not be in my house to see tomorrow arrive.
